dct_description_sm: This point shapefile represents Gas Stations for New Orleans, LA in 2018. It shows locations of Gas Stations, which are deemed essential following hurricanes or other disaster scenarios. This dataset is fed from the revenue department with nightly updates. This file was downloaded on December, 2018 by NYU Data Services. It was originally represented on the New Orleans Open Data Socrata portal as catalog record ujqw-tsvy
dct_title_s: Gas Stations for New Orleans, LA, 2018
